analysis.description:
Crowdfunding.withdraw (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#466-468) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! fund.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#466-468)

Crowdfunding.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#450-463) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bountyVal == 0

Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#162-163) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#69)

Crowdfunding.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#450-463) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bounty.transfer(msg.sender,bountyVal) (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#460-463)
Crowdfunding.reference (state variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#322-324) shadows built-in symbol "reference"
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#69)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#26:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/11/0xe9d61c62696a3c38e310c3e08ad6f48febcb520e.sol#46:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"
